user_query: I'm hosting a cooking competition and I need to analyze the nutritional value of the participants' dishes. Can you recommend an API that can provide detailed nutrition analysis for various ingredients and recipes? Additionally, I would like to gather guidelines on food safety and hygiene to ensure a successful event.

TaskList.description: Gather detailed nutritional analysis of ingredients and recipes used by participants.
Collect food safety and hygiene guidelines to ensure a successful cooking competition.
